00150     
00156     public static class ButtonListener4 implements FieldChangeListener {
00157         Citation c;
00158         CitationScreen4 cs4;
00159                     
00160         public ButtonListener4(CitationScreen4 _cs4, Citation _c){
00161             cs4 = _cs4;
00162             c = _c;
00163         }
00164                     
00165         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00166             ButtonField btn = (ButtonField) field;
00167             if(btn.getLabel().toString() == "Next"){ 
00168                 cs4.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00169                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen5(c));
00170             }
00171             else if(btn.getLabel().toString() == "Prev"){
00172                 cs4.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00173                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(cs4);
00174             }   
00175         }
00176     }
00177     
00178     static final class DMVButtonListener3 implements FieldChangeListener {
00179         private CitationScreen4 cs4 = null;
00180         
00181         public DMVButtonListener3(CitationScreen4 _cs4){
00182                 cs4 = _cs4;
00183         }
00184         
00185         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00186             ButtonField btn = (ButtonField)field;
00187             if (btn != null) {
00188                 QueryMgr query = ((CitationApp)UiApplication.getUiApplication()).getQueryMgr();
00189                 CVehicle cp = (CVehicle)query.getVehicleInfo(cs4.field_type.toString(),
00190                                                              cs4.field_plate.getText(),
00191                                                              cs4.field_reg_state.toString());
00192                 if (cp != null){
00193                     cs4.field_make.setText(cp.getElement(CVehicle.MAKE));
00194                     cs4.field_model.setText(cp.getElement(CVehicle.MODEL));
00195                     cs4.field_style.setSelectedIndex(cp.getElement(CVehicle.STYLE));
00196                     cs4.field_year.setText(cp.getElement(CVehicle.YEAR));
00197                     cs4.field_prim_color.setSelectedIndex(cp.getElement(CVehicle.PRIM_COLOR));
00198                     cs4.field_sec_color.setSelectedIndex(cp.getElement(CVehicle.SEC_COLOR));
00199                     cs4.field_VIN.setText(cp.getElement(CVehicle.VIN));
00200                 } else {
00201                     StringBuffer msg = new StringBuffer("Unable to retrieve DMV record.");
00202                     Dialog.inform(msg.toString());
00203                 }
00204             }
00205         }
00206     }
00207     
00208     private MenuItem saveItem4 = new MenuItem("Save", 110, 10) {
00209         public void run() {
00210             
00211                 storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00212                 CitationStore.Save();
00213         }
00214     };
00215 
00216     private MenuItem getItem4 = new MenuItem("Get", 110, 11) {
00217         public void run() {
00218                 
00219                 CitationStore.Restore();
00220                 restoreUIFieldsFromCitation();
00221         }
00222     };
00223    
00227     private void storeUIFieldsToCitation()
00228     {
00229         c.Vehicle.setElement(CVehicle.TYPE, field_type.toString());
00230         c.Vehicle.setElement(CVehicle.PLATE, field_plate.toString());
00231         c.Vehicle.setElement(CVehicle.REG_STATE, field_reg_state.toString());
00232         c.Vehicle.setElement(CVehicle.MAKE, field_make.getText());
00233         c.Vehicle.setElement(CVehicle.MODEL, field_model.getText());
00234         c.Vehicle.setElement(CVehicle.STYLE, field_style.toString());    
00235         c.Vehicle.setElement(CVehicle.YEAR, field_year.toString());    
00236         c.Vehicle.setElement(CVehicle.PRIM_COLOR, field_prim_color.toString());
00237         c.Vehicle.setElement(CVehicle.SEC_COLOR, field_sec_color.toString());
00238         c.Vehicle.setElement(CVehicle.VIN, field_VIN.getText());       
00239     }
00240     
00245     private void restoreUIFieldsFromCitation()
00246     {
00247         field_type.setSelectedIndex(c.Vehicle.getElement(CVehicle.TYPE));
00248         field_plate.setText(c.Vehicle.getElement(CVehicle.PLATE));
00249         field_reg_state.setSelectedIndex(c.Vehicle.getElement(CVehicle.REG_STATE));
00250         field_make.setText(c.Vehicle.getElement(CVehicle.MAKE));
00251         field_model.setText(c.Vehicle.getElement(CVehicle.MODEL));
00252         field_style.setSelectedIndex(c.Vehicle.getElement(CVehicle.STYLE));
00253         field_year.setText(c.Vehicle.getElement(CVehicle.YEAR));
00254         field_prim_color.setSelectedIndex(c.Vehicle.getElement(CVehicle.PRIM_COLOR));
00255         field_sec_color.setSelectedIndex(c.Vehicle.getElement(CVehicle.SEC_COLOR));
00256         field_VIN.setText(c.Vehicle.getElement(CVehicle.VIN));
00257     }
00258 }
